entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's father is mentioned as having grown up and not been seen since last August. This suggests that Voldemort's family has a history of mysterious disappearances.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as looking seriously at Harry and discussing the disappearances with him.

relationships.description: The disappearances of Voldemort's father and others seem to be linked, as discussed by Dumbledore and Harry.
Harry is having a conversation with Dumbledore about the disappearances and his own trial in the Pensieve.
